website_summaries.verdict: If you need a budget-friendly table that has folding legs and top, we recommend the Office Star table instead.
pros: Powder-coated legs and thick, polyethylene top
cons: The top isn't completely flat or level, and the table is somewhat awkward to maneuver

customer_reviews.title: Some warping at the middle.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy table, even at the middle where it folds. I've used this table for a couple of years, for both indoor and outdoor activities. While setting the table up this September I noticed a slight warp in the table where it folds. This warping happened after some usage, but I'm not sure when. I feel that it was caused by the sun. The warping is annoying, but at this time doesn't interfere with the food setup. If this gets worse I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Smoker

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I had been trying to find an 8 foot table like this forever since the largest Costco sells is just 6 feet. I was amazed at how quickly it came because I think it came the next day after I ordered it. The table is just as described and is really easy to set up. This is well made and the plastic top is thick and durable, which is exactly what we were looking for. It was just a little dusty and dirty when it arrived, but it cleaned up really quick and well. We are currently thinking about ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: rcpautah

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best folding tables on the market
customer_reviews.text: When our company needed another option for conference tables (instead of renting for $150 to $375 on location) we did our due diligence trying out folding tables to ship along. The quality and ruggedness of these tables are far beyond any other on the market and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, did come with minor damage.
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because of one of the corners being dinged up, as many others have stated as well. It arrived on the day I needed to use it, and it worked out perfectly - the smooshed corner was not an issue as I had a tablecloth on it, but even if no cover, don't think this would have caught anyone's attention at the party. Not worth returning for this, and I would probably take the chance and purchase again or recommend to a friend to buy at this low price.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great table when what you need is space
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I can sit right on the center edge without it bowing (160lbs). Easy to setup, really, all you do is unfold it (you can flip the locking switch underneath, too.) Lightweight. Cons: Surface is a little bumpy around the edges. Center seam is 1.5mm wide and doesn't always form an even line. Came a little dirty but nothing that can't be fixed with a quick clean. Plastic is a thinner than I had thought, easy to slightly depress it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob A. Ferrero

customer_reviews.title: Easily damaged in transport
customer_reviews.text: Be aware of the high likelihood of transport damage with these tables. We have received five Lifetime tables from Amazon and all but one arrived damaged, with a dented corner. I am not sure if its the packaging, the way they are handled in the warehouse, or the shipping companies throwing them around. I would not buy a product like this online again. The table as such is very sturdy and easy to setup albeit a bit heavy. Very stable whether they are setup inside or on the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: make your Thanksgiving easier !
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write Amazon reviews but I’m so happy with this table! I wanted to use it for Thanksgiving I was thinking of renting but this was a great price and I will have it for a long time. The table is not too heavy I can lift it (I wouldn’t run track with it but I can lift it.) It’s easy to set up and it even has a handle on the side to help with the lifting. The added bonus of having it delivered right to my door is huge. I am beyond happy that I bought this and now have one less thing to worry about for Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Keltner

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday as a stand for my 65" TV, computer, stereo system and as a desk. It's been very durable for the couple of years I've had it. All the weight will slightly warp the plastic when concentrated in a small area, but only slightly. It also looks nice and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: nowuknow

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Large!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to purchase the non-folding Lifetime table but did not due to negative feedback. Instead, I purchased this one based on all the positive reviews. It's sturdy, lightweight (40#), and folds in half and has a handle on the side for easy-carry. It was packaged well, too. There were corner protectors (cardboard) to keep from shipping damages. It will fit 8 people easily with enough tableware for a lovely event or simply for serving food during a banquet.
customer_reviews.author: The Bee

customer_reviews.title: Love that this table folds in half! easy to move and store away when not using!
customer_reviews.text: This table has been fantastic! I love that it folds in half. For a table that is 8 feet long it really helps to transport it by folding in half. It is easy to open and set up and to take down. this table is very study and well made and feels like it is made to last! I first looked at home depot and lowes for a 8 ft table but all they had were tables that were solid and did not fold. Talk about transporting that thing! I would highly recommend this table if you are looking for one that is this long! It is easy to move and store.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Mama

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy table. Im using it as my desk since ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy table. Im using it as my desk since theres a lot of space on top for my files, etc. Im very happy with it. We are going to use it as a table in the living room for the holiday for guests and cover it up with a holiday tablecloth. We rented a similar one last year and this was inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: B White

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality table!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy table. I use it in an office environment and I am very satisfied with the table. The surface is perfect for directly writing on (you don't need a blotter or any other underlayment ). I've got a complete desk top computer, two printers, a bunch of accessories, paper and files on top of the table and it is solid as a rock. No wobble, no sagging, no shifting. This is a quality table!
customer_reviews.author: walt z

customer_reviews.title: Dented table :(
customer_reviews.text: I received my package and the table is horrible all dented up on the one side! Not pleased at all
customer_reviews.author: tab

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for large gatherings
customer_reviews.text: These tables are great. Eight feet long (apx. 24" wide - uncertain) and they fold in half for easy portability. We have borrowed 8' tables that do not fold in half, and it's always more than just a hateful chore. These tables are very durable, and easy to load in a car trunk. I can foresee these lasting a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: pinchdogster

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: This table is VERY large and heavy and can handle a lot of weight, and doesn't wiggle around, but does sway when nudged. Also folds down to a very large, but manageable package with sturdy handles for moving it around. It's pretty heavy folded up and you'll need to be strong to carry it easily. It's so tall on it's side, you kind of have to lift it up off the ground in a clumsy, walk. It's too tall to carry dangling like a suitcase, unless you're 7 feet tall. The white top seems to be recycled or very tough plastic. You could probably leave it out in the rain with little impact. Pretty impressive for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LOK

customer_reviews.title: Crack on side of table after 4 times of use
customer_reviews.text: Got a crack on the side of the table, didn't think that it was supposed to crack like this. Wouldn't recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Jana M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table for what we needed. Very sturdy and folds easily and safely. Easy to lift and store. Although package says 'heavy' for lifting, it is really well within the capability of one average-sized woman to put this table up and take it down. I put the top down onto the floor before putting up the legs, then lifted the table upright. Good price and excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: thrifty shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not flat when standing
customer_reviews.text: Tables are in the process of being returned.. when we set the tables up they peaked in the middle abdcwpuld not lay flat. They had some scratches and also were very dirty
customer_reviews.author: Holly Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Soft and prone to dents and caves in the plastic
customer_reviews.text: I use the table as a work bench and placed two computer mini towers on it for a few months. Now there is a curve in the table as the plastic caved in. Can't use the table for anything else because it is no longer flat. Disappointed. I placed plywood sheets on the tables to keep it flat, but this is not what it was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Devek Maga

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect table
customer_reviews.text: This contraption folds up like a suitcase with a handy dandy handle for transporting. I use it for my projector and DVD player for my backyard theater fun. You know with a 16ft blow up screen, that kind of junk. Gets all the equipment up off the ground to the right height.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin King

customer_reviews.title: Holds a ton of food.
customer_reviews.text: The table was easy to open and close. It can carry a heavy load, as was confirmed by the ton of food placed upon it for Thanksgiving. It provided the extra space we needed to accommodate the number of people we placed around it. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, we will use this for years, very happy with it,
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This table does exactly what it was described to do. I will be using this for years, and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Normal Person

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime tables
customer_reviews.text: These tables arrived as stated, and are very sturdy and just what I needed. I'd recommend these for parties or holiday get togethers. I brought these tables for a pool party, which I'll decorate! I recommend buying these tables.
customer_reviews.author: Louvenia Grace

customer_reviews.title: 1 Damaged - 2 Fine
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 that I needed to use immediately. Two showed up fine..the third had damage to each side that almost made it seem as though it had been crushed. The table still worked. There is a reason these are this particular price. We did not return because we had to use it right away. We left packaging feedback which was basically cardboard around the table.
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table to use outside for family gatherings, and it is perfect for that use. Because it folds in half, it is easier to store than prior tables I have used while providing a much larger surface area for eating or crafting.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: but luckily the table itself was fine. They need to really look at how they ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the $100 and having it shipped right to the door with prime. The box was damaged which made me worry based on other reviews of it arriving damaged, but luckily the table itself was fine. They need to really look at how they are packaging this table. Aside from that, however, the table is exactly what is advertised: sturdy, reliable, strong, long, easy to carry with built-in handles. Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: L. W

customer_reviews.title: Great for family dinners
customer_reviews.text: Very well made table, provides extra seating for dining, very sturdy and the legs lock into place. Use this as extra table for family dinners and find that it holds eight people very comfortably and could go up to ten people. It's easy to put together and holds up to the weight of all the dishes and food.
customer_reviews.author: Jill W

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE...Lifetime products never disappoint me and this is no exception. it is great for storage since it folds in half right down the middle..we have had this table set outside in all kinds of weather and it easily wipes clean and looks great..very durable
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Does what a table is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Its a table there's not too much you can say about a table. It's long but not as wide as I thought it would be. It feels strong and stable. I'm sure it has a weight limit, for example I wouldn't sit on it but for most items it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Came with damage or defects but the box was fine.
customer_reviews.text: Table came with some damage or major defects but the box on the outside was fine. Cuts and warping. Exchanging this one and hoping the second one is better.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 of these tables for use in an ongoing promotional program. We use these 9-12 times a month at various locations both indoor and outdoor. All 4 units have held up traveling in a trailer and being tossed around during load-in and load-out. The tables feature a reliable locking mechanism to avoid tables folding in during use. High quality product, would definitely recommend. These units are heavier and sturdier than typical folding tables.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: ... me so I ordered from Amazon and was very pleased with the result
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find an 8 foot folding table at any store near me so I ordered from Amazon and was very pleased with the result. I have only used it for one event but appears to be incredibly sturdy and well built. Be warned, it is large and heavy (much thicker than a 6 foot folding table) but I'm happy to have the quality. The box it was shipped in was rather beat up and there is a small dent in one of the corners of the table because of it. I cover with table cloth and can deal with small imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great tables with no complaints
customer_reviews.text: These are some heavy-duty tables that are the perfect size for a family get together. Hopefully these tables will live up to the name.... LIFETIME and continue to stand the test of time for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nicholas B. Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: NOT EVEN OR LEVEL
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY if you need the table to open flat and level... since it hinges at the middle of the table, it's slightly uneven, and the computer I intended to put in the middle of it leans *badly* to one side. If it doesn't have to be totally flat I suppose it's a fine table. I ordered two, and one arrived slightly damaged. Don't really care but these tables aren't designed to be banged around much.
customer_reviews.author: B. Chatellier

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the first table that was delivered. Had some warpage and was also damaged in transit. Got it replaced and the one that came is great. Having the big table able to break in half makes it great for storage and also transport. For years we were buying the large wooden folding tables, but the durability and spacious design has me hooked on the lifetime tables.
customer_reviews.author: dogpile

customer_reviews.title: Wow, incredible table that folds out flat and is sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We were afraid that the folding tables would be weak in the middle, since we need these tables for trade shows. Wow, they are fantastic! They fold out 100% flat and do not bow down, even with some significant weight placed in the middle. We purchased one to test and have now ordered 5 more. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table...reasonable price...and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I have not complaints about this table. I know that others have had shipping complaints. The one I received had no damage and arrived in less than 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Packaged
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this because the box was not sturdy and was poorly sealed which caused a large dent on one end. This size table is a bit heavy so I opted not to replace it but rather buy two 4' folding tables of the same quality (same manufacturer) and they cost the same as the one larger one. The smaller tables are 24" wide instead of 30" but for my needs they work fine but much easier to handle.
customer_reviews.author: senior citizen

customer_reviews.title: Tidy table
customer_reviews.text: Great table and price!! Love this table that folds. Definitely easier to store than a table that does not fold. The table is very sturdy and easy to unfold and use. Purchasing the table via Amazon and having it delivered was easier and cheaper than buying it from the big warehouse store.
customer_reviews.author: Riverwood1

customer_reviews.title: 8" Banquet Table
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! School kids love painting on it. I will use for the holidays or celebrations outdoors as well as indoors!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great complement to the chairs I bought
customer_reviews.text: Great complement to the chairs I bought, but a little concerned about the integrity of the center fold section hinge over the long haul. Lots of "play" (twist) that might end up compromising the entire table. Just pushing the table out of the closet and into the dining room indicated the joint did not hold the two halves stable against one another and I suspect this might lead to a shorter overall useful life. I think the smaller version of the table wouldn't suffer the same. Kind of wish it was just a solid table.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea Kinsman

customer_reviews.title: Ok, if you do not mind the hump in the middle
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad table, but it never actually lays flat. It is easy to store, but if you want a flat table, go to Lowes where you can purchase one long one for the same price or less.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: nice table
customer_reviews.text: I like the table but it has some flaws (one side of the table top has bumps like someone used a ballping hammer on the under side of the table) and the box was a mess when it was delivered. The only thing holding the box together was the strap around it. I would have sent it back but my husband said it would be too much trouble and since we were going to use a tablecloth on it he thought it would be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Amanns

customer_reviews.title: These tables are great! The quality is very good and the tables ...
customer_reviews.text: These tables are great! The quality is very good and the tables are sturdy. Very easy to set up and fold. Nice and heavy, yet manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Compact when folded and light enough that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Compact when folded and light enough that I can easily carry it (I'm a 60 yr old women). It doesn't lay completely flat (slightly raised in center) but I believe this may be planned in the design so it will flatten as weight is placed on it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, easy set up folding table
customer_reviews.text: Nice folding table. Strong, sturdy construction. Built in Handles facilitate setup and transport. Very well constructed. But a bit heavy which is acceptable for strength and durability! Easy storage folded.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent G

customer_reviews.title: This table is perfect for those times (Thanksgiving
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for those times (Thanksgiving!) when you have too many people over dining with you that can easily sit at your kitchen or dining table. It is extremely easy to set up and is sturdy yet not too heavy. It doesn't take up too much room when storing it away for those off times.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, yet light weight table. Not flimsy at all. Table legs are tucked far underneath so you don't bump your legs when sitting. We used it to set up a second table for Christmas dinner. When covered and set, you'd never know it was a plastic folding table.
customer_reviews.author: F. Madeira

customer_reviews.title: Tables appear to be well made and sturdy. No regrets or issues.
customer_reviews.text: Tables seem to be sturdy yet easy to transport. I like the built-in handles that are easy to grab but don't get in the way while the table is in use.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: We ordered 3 tables. I returned 2 of 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3 tables. I returned 2 of 3 because of damage. I opened the final table yesterday and it was damaged. The return time has run out. Lesson learned to open all boxes when you get them. In my view these tables are 2nds or scratch and dents as all of them have something wrong. Joe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up by one person
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as stated. No damage. Worked right out of the box. Easy to set up by one person. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pomme

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to set up, easy to store
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says. I like that it folds in half - an 8-foot table would be unwieldy otherwise. Very easy to set up. It saved us at Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Handy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We love this table, been used to hold materials for home improvement projects to eating dinner ! VERY sturdy !
customer_reviews.author: NYB

customer_reviews.title: Quality/Cost
customer_reviews.text: Love this table, used it for a baby shower and was perfect. Great quality and price. We bought a Lifetime Shed also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great table at a great price
customer_reviews.text: A great table at a great price. High quality easy to clean easy to fold and very stong. I will buy more as I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime tables are the best--you can purchase with confidence
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about an 8' table that folds in the middle. But Lifetime brand tables have been a good value purchase previously so gave it a try. Impressively well built and there's no concern at all that it might collapse at the fold point. Here's an unreserved recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: LightPixie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable tables.
customer_reviews.text: These tables are fantastic! They are light enough to be portable so I can set up my booth at art shows, yet sturdy enough to hold all of my display items without worry. I also use them for get-togethers at my home when I need additional table space. I highly recommend these tables!
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality table. heavy duty. We use this table for selling our products at the local farmers market.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This table is quite good, and serves the purpose for which we bought it well. It feels a bit shaky in the center at times, which I'm sure is due to the extended length, so if you are looking for a rock solid table top, this is not for you. But, if you need a general duty table with this length, that folds up into a reasonably compact size, this is an ideal choice.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: Not as well made as I feel they should be for the price. They have already warped after only a few times of using them. They are heavy and take up a lot of space. I would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but slightly bent in middle
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy table for the money. Because of this it's quite heavy so if you have limited strength I would not recommend. The other thing I'm not thrilled about is that in the middle of the table where the table bends in half when opened is slightly higher than the ends of the table, creating a slight slope.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Color not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning twice, color is not as pictured. Went with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Roettger

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, strong, durable, easy to clean, easy to fold!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: these tables are the best ever !! they are so sturdy and I love them . I love that they fold in half for a much better storage. I ordered 4 of theses and they are great. delivery was on time package had not damaged very satisfied customer !!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISSIE

customer_reviews.title: Tough Table
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a tough solid folding table. Good quality construction. A bit expensive, but OK because of it's solid construction. Should actually last a lifetime, as it's name implies.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Normand

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Classy product. We have other similar tables already but this folds and unfolds easily and carrying handle makes moving it around very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Easy!!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to fold & unfold. Great portable option for those occasions when an 8' table is a must and transportation is a family vehicle! The table looks good as-is; add a cloth or drape & it works as a banquet table: food or a meeting.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect for thanksgiving to add more people to the meal
customer_reviews.text: 8 feet long and folds in half, it was perfect for thanksgiving to add more people to the meal. This table was very solid and heavy and I was happy to find a handle so I could carry it myself. Great investment for portable entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Petterle

customer_reviews.title: Good table but damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The table was perfect other than the giant dent in the one corner. The delivery box was fine, no damage, it wasn't until we opened the box that we saw it was dented on the crease, which was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This table would have been perfect but it is super heavy
customer_reviews.text: This table would have been perfect but it is super heavy! I have to ask my husband for help everytime I need to move it. Other than that, great quality, sturdy, made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena S.

customer_reviews.title: One of my two orders was delivered with a smashed ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my two orders was delivered with a smashed box. The tablehad a little damage at one end but not a huge issue. However, the table is well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Ted-T

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLE!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT table...great quality. Love a Lifetime table. This one is big, & bulky to carry for a woman, but perfect for vendors at craft shows.
customer_reviews.author: Jandafern

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Nice Finish, Banquet or Multi-Purpose Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is sturdy, has a nice finish and I can use it for multiple tasks, in addition to being a banquet table.
customer_reviews.author: M A C 1003

customer_reviews.title: Great strong folding table
customer_reviews.text: Used for weekly breakfast meeting...they are strong and very neat in appearance
customer_reviews.author: Denise_AIS

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for a craft show but will use it as buffet table for the holidays Can't beat the price for this size table .
customer_reviews.author: Robot

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful folding table
customer_reviews.text: This table is great. Easy to store, easy to carry, very light but still very strudy. We used it at my sons wedding for a cookie/pie table & we stack several cedar wood slices on it plus all the desersts & it held up perfectly. Best thing is you don't need a pick-up to haul this 8' table. Amazon got it to me in a 2 days. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Toni from P-dub

customer_reviews.title: Handy for the Holidays
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful table. Easily seats 10 and you could squeze 12 with smaller chairs. It is pretty sturdy, i arrived without directions, but we figured out how to open it. It did take a few tries. It cane with a dent on the side, but with a table cloth nobody knows. All and all, a good buy and a life saver when you are hosting 21 at the holidays. Folds for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Laura MC

customer_reviews.title: We had a group of ladies over my house for ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a group of ladies over my house for an anniversary and it fit everyone very well! Its wide enough to fit 2 rows of dinner dishes and enough leg room so no one is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Orchanian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a very good quality table, & the price makes it even better, I'm tempting myself to get another one
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: well made and sturdy. They are not cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are large, well made and sturdy. They are not cheap, but they will last me a "lifetime"!! My kids are small so I will get pleny of use out of them for years to come with backyard birthday parties, BBQ's, etc. I bought 3. They were an investment, but I'm glad I did it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cira

customer_reviews.title: Great tables Amazon start shipping to Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: great table, i have parties every now and then at the house and these 8 footers are awesome since they're a little easier to store for me, wish they shipped this straight to Hawaii. Come on Amazon I'm prime whats the deal
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to unfold the first time but, other than that, well crafted.
customer_reviews.author: Snowball

customer_reviews.title: Bought to use a cutting table.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use a cutting table. Needed a space to cut out fabric without bending over a bed. Fit the requirement.
customer_reviews.author: MrPAW

customer_reviews.title: Super strong table.
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Its really strong and can be used for multiple purposes. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gadson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this table but it's really, really heavy to move around and set up. Especially for one person
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: ... big crowd coming and needed a table that would easily seat 8 (and might could seat 10 in a ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a big crowd coming and needed a table that would easily seat 8 (and might could seat 10 in a pinch by using the ends.) This table was perfect. When folded, it has a handle for easy carrying. It unfolds easily and is plenty sturdy. The 30" width is enough to accommodate large dinner plates when people are sitting across from each other. It was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect; X-mas dinner for large family; put two together, worked just fine!!
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy table. Like the pretty minimal legs. Some tables have very obtrusive legs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schnoor

customer_reviews.title: This table is so great and have my PC
customer_reviews.text: This table is so great and have my PC, monitor, Cameo and big HP printer with stacks of paper and it is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: MsOrlando

customer_reviews.title: Strong but stains easily.
customer_reviews.text: Great table, well made and nice finish. Only thing I'd change is the stain resistance, the open pored plastic sucks up stains like a vacuum, and cleaning it requires either harsh chemicals or possibly scrubbing, which I haven't done because I don't wat to scratch it up and make it even more stain loving. Otherwise strong and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Charlemagne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Table for a very reasonable price. I highly recommend. Sturdy enough to put two computers on it without fear.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan VonEngeln

customer_reviews.title: Still will be useful. Folding is convenient
customer_reviews.text: Okay, but a little shakey. Still will be useful. Folding is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Sunderland

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these tables for a party. Worked out great and were big enough for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and easy store
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's baby shower. It is sturdy and easy store. Easy to put up and take down. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Erica H

customer_reviews.title: Convenience and Strong
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 eight foot folding tables. They are strong and very convenience. I was slightly disappointed to discover upon delivery that my table had wavy bumps on the edges all the way around. Since I needed the table for immediate use and the fact the waves were not all that outlandish I am making do with it. Overall, I am very satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kinley

customer_reviews.title: It's a table. It folds up. 'Nuff said.
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent quality table. The length is nice for a backyard barbecue. We recently had a party with about 60 people and we catered food. The table was the perfect size to keep all the food, plates, cups, etc. It works. Get it if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: ExxeKhan

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I received the table damaged. It works. The table appears as though it was dropped several times, the corner is damaged (plastic is buckled) as well as the middle of the table edge. I was unable to find anyway to review this until now. I am not impressed with the damaged table. And this is sold by Amazon. I checked online but there is no where on the site someone can complain...so I am doing it here. My suggestion is to go to a physical location to purchase the table...Lifetime has a great reputation for quality...unfortunately if you order this online you may shocked at what you get... Dissappointed in Rhode Island
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: This 8 foot table let's me turn my livingroom into a dinning room for the holidays. It is a huge table that folds flat and hides behind the couch all year. I also set it up sometimes when I have a quilting projec that needs more room than I have in my sewing room.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Matches color of pair from Costco
customer_reviews.text: I've already got two tables like this that I bought from Costco. I wanted a third. It wasn't clear that the 'almond' color here would match. Turns out it does, it's exactly the same shade as the ones I've already got.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Great tables sturdy and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 9 tables for condo clubhouse. The description matched tables perfectly. Lightweight and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

product_meta.title: Lifetime 80175 Fold In Half Banquet Table, 8 Feet, Almond
product_meta.description: Color:AlmondLifetime’s 8-Foot Commercial Fold-In-Half Table is constructed of high-density polyethylene and has a convenient folding design for easy transport and storage. The lightweight design and convenient carry handle make it easy for anyone to set up and take down. Our tables are UV-protected, will not crack, chip or peel, and are built for indoor and outdoor use. The patented steel frame design provides a sturdy foundation and is protected with a powder-coated, weather-resistant finish. Built for the rigors of heavy-duty use, Lifetime Commercial Fold-In-Half Tables exceed challenging BIFMA standards and are perfect for your next banquet, event, or group gathering.
feature_bullets: 96" x 30" table is constructed of High Density Polyethylene with impact resistant corners for superior strength and durability
Table is designed to fold in half for easy transport and storage; folded dimensions- 49.2" l x 30" w x 4.3" H
Lightweight table only weighs 41.4 lbs; includes an easy carry handle
UV protected top is stain resistant and easy to clean
High Strength Low Alloy Steel frame is designed for indoor and outdoor use; backed by a 10-year limited manufacturer warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars516 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
